comments:
Build ID: 3.3
Driver: 4.4.0.1-200707040100

Steps To Reproduce:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the Heap Profiler in "controlled" or "enabled" mode:
java -agentlib:JPIBootLoader=JPIAgent:server=controlled;HeapProf <Java Class>

2. Click "Open profile dialog ..."
3. Go to "Attach to Agent" configuration
4. Go to "Agents" tab and wait until agents appear
5. Go out from configuration e.g. to "Java application" 
   and press "No" for "Save changes?" in configuration 

Exceptions are printed in console:
